meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I skysurfed on the clouds.
meanings.sent2: He skysurfed across the sky effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous penguin skysurfed down the icy slope.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination skysurfed through the pages of the book.
meanings.sent5: The kite skysurfed in the strong wind, dancing in the air.

meanings.definition: Skysurfed: participated in the sport of skysurfing
meanings.sent1: Last summer, she skysurfed in the competition.
meanings.sent2: They skysurfed together, enjoying the thrill of the sport.
meanings.sent3: The cat pretended to skysurf on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts skysurfed through memories of the championship.
meanings.sent5: The surfer skysurfed the waves, feeling the rush of adrenaline.
